Name: Bear Hill
Comment: Bear Hill, trail skirts viewless summit

Name: Brainard Hill and Nedobity Road
Comment: Brainard Hill Road + Nedobity Road, NOBO turn W on road

Name: Brainard Hill Road
Comment: Brainard Hill Road, NOBO continue E on road, limited parking

Name: Brooks Road
Comment: Brooks Road, NOBO follow road 200 ft W then turn E (compass NW), limited parking, water from reservoir, Nino's Pizza (LD) 1.0W on Saybrook Rd (N)

Name: Coan Pond and Rockland Parking
Comment: Privy (0.1E), Rockland Preserve Parking (0.2E) along Lone Pine Trail (Blue/Red) and Dave Houston Trail (Red) to Renee's Way

Name: Confusing Blazes
Comment: Multiple blazed paths, trail goes compass W and S

Name: Eastern Terminus
Comment: Eastern Terminus, River Road, parking, Middletown 4.0W

Name: Foot Hills Road
Comment: Foot Hills Road, NOBO continue W on trail

Name: Millers Pond
Comment: Millers Pond reservoir and small field

Name: Millers Pond E
Comment: Millers Pond, Parking and pit toilet 0.3W along white blazed trail then right along gravel road to Foot Hills Road entrance

Name: Nedobity and Thayer Road
Comment: Nedobity Road + Thayer Road, NOBO turn W on road

Name: Old Blue Hills Road
Comment: Old Blue Hills Road - NOBO contine on trail to E, limited parking on shoulder

Name: Parking
Comment: Parking, Braemore Preserve, 1.1W along Bridle Trail (yellow) then Lone Pine Trail (Blue/Red)

Name: Parking 2
Comment: Parking, 0.1W to Cream Pot Road on Selectmen's Path (Blue/Yellow)

Name: Pisgah Road + Old Blue Hills Road
Comment: 5-way intersection - NOBO leave Pisgah Road, cross Madison Road (CT79), continue on Old Blue Hills Road, Restaurants (BLD) 0.8W, Durham, CT 1.8W

Name: Powerline road 1
Comment: Powerline Road, follow road for a few feet then back to trail

Name: Rockland Preserve Camping
Comment: Rockland Preserve Camping (0.1E) Tent platforms, fire pit, 3 privies - one at site, 2 more just past camping area on Dave Houston Trail, water at Coan Pond 0.1E, access is muddy.

Name: Scenic View 7
Comment: Views across powerline corridor to NRG Energy and the Connecticut River

Name: Thayer Road and Saybrook (CT154)
Comment: Thayer Road + Saybrook (CT154), NOBO leave Thayer road and continue on trail across Saybrook Road, Deb's restuarant (BL) + Middletown Bus stop 0.2E, Coyote Blue Tex Mex Cafe (D) 0.5W, Higganum, CT 1.5E, parking

Name: Wiese Albert and Foot Hills Road
Comment: Wiese Albert + Foot Hills Road, NOBO contine E on Foot Hills Road
